data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On July 19, 2023, And Continued On July 20, 2023
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the above-referred intimation, we wish to inform you that, the Board of Directors, at its meeting,
held on July 20, 2023, commenced at 0800 Hrs (IST) and concluded at 1530 Hrs (IST), has inter-alia taken
the following decisions:
Approval of the Audited Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2023
Pursuant to Regulation 33 and all other applicable regulations, if any of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and
Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Audited Financial Results for the quarter ended
June 30, 2023, have been approved. Accordingly, we enclose the following documents:
1. Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2023;
2. Auditors' Report dated July 20, 2023, on the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the
quarter ended June 30, 2023

data.caption:
Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On January 17, 2023, And Concluded On
January 18, 2023
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that, the Board of Directors, at its meeting held on January 18, 2023, commenced at 0830 Hrs. (IST) and concluded at 1610 Hrs., has inter-alia taken the following decisions:
A. Approval of the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and period ended December 31, 2022
Pursuant to Regulation 33 and all other applicable regulations, if any of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and period ended December 31, 2022, have been approved.
B. Approval of the payment of Interim Dividend for the FY 2022-23:
The Board of Directors has approved the payment of an Interim Dividend of INR 28/- (INR Twenty-Eight
only) per Equity Share of INR 10 each for the Financial Year 2022-23.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On July 20, 2022, And Continued On July 21, 2022
data.news_body:
Dear Sir / Madam,

Pursuant to the above-referred intimation, we wish to inform you that, the Board of Directors, at its meeting, held on July 21, 2022 and concluded at 2327Hrs (IST), has inter-alia taken the following decisions:

Approval of the Audited Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2022

data.caption: Submission Of Disclosures Of Related Party Transactions On A Consolidated Basis For The Half-Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that, pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and all other applicable regulations the Company has uploaded the disclosures of related party transactions on a consolidated basis for the half-year ended March 31, 2022, on the portal of the exchanges on May 6, 2022, via XBRL utility.However, the Company received an e-mail from the National Stock Exchange of India Limited dated May 27, 2022, wherein the companies were instructed to re-submit the same in a revised XBRL published by the exchanges for the format prescribed under SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662 dated November 22, 2021, issued by the Securities and Exchange Board of India. Accordingly, the Company is re-submitting herewith, the disclosures of related party transactions on a consolidated basis for the half-year ended March 31, 2022, in a revised format, for your records.

data.news_body:
This is with reference to earlier submission of Fact Sheet by the Company under above referred letter. Please note, while submitting the same, the Company inadvertently submitted the version of the Fact Sheet which was not finalized.

Therefore, please find enclosed the final version of the fact sheet of the Consolidated Financial Data for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021. Request you to take the same on record. Please remove the submission made by the Company vide letter no. letter no. NSE & BSE / 2021-22 / 95 dated October 26, 2021 from your website at the earliest convenience so that the investors would be able to refer the correct communication by the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed fact sheet of the Consolidated Financial Data for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021.

The Company has scheduled an investor / analyst call on Wednesday, October 27, 2021 at 5.00 PM IST. During such call, the Management will comment on the financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021 as well as on the business outlook.

The details of the said investor call are available on the website of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On October 26, 2021 And To Be Continued On October 27, 2021
data.news_body:
Further to the above referred Intimation, we wish to inform that, the Board of Directors, at its meeting held through Tele-conferencing on October 26, 2021 and to be continued on October 27, 2021, has inter-alia taken the following decisions:

A. Approval of the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021

Pursuant to Regulation 33 and all other applicable regulations, if any of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021 have been approved. Accordingly, we enclose the following documents:

1. Auditors' Report dated October 26, 2021 on the Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021;
2. Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021;
Please refer annexure for further details

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
In continuation to the above referred intimations and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and SEBI notification dated May 5, 2021, please find enclosed the transcripts of the investor / analyst call held on Friday, July 23, 2021.

This transcript is also available on the Company's website at
https://www.persistent.com/investors/quarterly-results/

The audio recording of the said call is available on the Company's website at
https://www.persistent.com/investors/quarterly-results/

data.caption: Persistent Systems Limited - Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On July 22, 2021 And Continued On July 23, 2021
data.news_body:
Further to our Intimations dated July 13, 2021, we wish to inform that, the Board of Directors, at its meeting held through Tele-conferencing on July 22, 2021 and to be continued on July 23, 2021, has inter-alia taken the following decisions:

Approval of the Audited Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021

Pursuant to Regulation 33 and all other applicable regulations, if any of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Audited Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 have been approved. Accordingly, we are attaching relevant documents.

Please note that the discussion on above agenda items was concluded at 2000 Hrs. (IST). pursuant to our intimation dated July 13, 2021, the Board Meeting will continue for discussing other agenda items on Friday, July 23, 2021.

data.caption: Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and all other applicable regulations, if any, the disclosures of related party transactions on a consolidated basis for the half year ended March 31, 2021 are enclosed for your records.

March 31, 2021.

data.caption: Approval Of The Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 and all other applicable regulations, if any of the SEBI (Listing
Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Audited Financial Results for
the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021 have been approved. Accordingly, we enclose the
following documents:
1. Auditors' Report dated April 29, 2021 on the Consolidated Financial Results of the Company
for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021;
2. Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended
March 31, 2021;
3. Auditors' Report dated April 29, 2021 on the Unconsolidated Financial Results of the Company
for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021;
4. Unconsolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended
March 31, 2021.
